text: Ciurea is a surname. Notable people with the surname include: *Aurelia Ciurea (born 1982), Romanian gymnast *Constantin Stamati-Ciurea (1828-1898), Romanian writer and translator *Cornel Ciurea (born 1972), Moldovan politician *Tudoranca Ciurea (1888–1971), Romanian army general Category:Romanian- language surnames
title: Ciurea (surname)
